name: RomanticMessage
0:
”Alexa, ask Romantic message to start”
”Alexa, open Romantic message”
”Alexa, launch Romantic message”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: romantic message
des:
Are you struggling to fill write a special message on a loved ones birthday or valentines day card? Are you in the dog house and need a romantic message to use on applogy flowers?

Let romantic message take the pain our of searching the Internet and ask Alexa for a romantic message! Each time you use this skill a random message will be generated. All messages use family friendly language. Most are lovey dovey - but one or two are a little bit cheeky!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
